name: TopDown (BrianCheung)
description:
A small game that I made while learning how to use the unity engine. If there are any problems, don't hesitate to let me know. Hope you  enjoy!

## Controls

WASD  ->  Movement
Ctrl  ->  Attack
ALT   ->  Interact
Shift ->  Skills
R     ->  Restart

## Gameplay
https://streamable.com/9ul43c 

## Game Includes
1 level with 4 rooms
Player attack and movement
Monster attack and chase
Traps
Treasure chests
Boss Battle
